title: A note on the positivity of inverse operators acting on $C^*$-algebras
abstract:
For a positive and invertible linear operator $T$ acting on a $C^*$-algebra,
we give necessary and sufficient criteria for the inverse operator $T^{-1}$ to
be positive, too. Moreover, a simple counterexample shows that $T^{-1}$ need
not be positive even if $T$ is unital and its spectrum is contained in the unit
circle.
